column4: I unclicked gdm through the serivces menu in the system.  It doesn't load gdm anymore but I thought you could just click the box again to have it load.  It doesn't appear to as simple as that as I have reclicked the box in systems but gdm doesn't start anymore
I run that command, it says they already exist
well then X should start at boot... 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart'
